title: Co-Teaching-Based STEAM Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Analysis of Case Studies on Implementing Practical STEAM Education for Working Professionals and Building a Project-Based Collaborative Learning Environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain a STEAM education model utilizing cooperative teaching by distinguishing at least three stages.
Learners design real-world work problem-solving projects using smartphone-based digital tools.
Learners develop two or more assessment rubrics aligned with Project-Based Learning (PBL) principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
